tickets.title: Fix broken footer links
tickets.body: The links in the website footer are not working properly. Clicking them does not lead to the intended pages. Please investigate and fix this issue.

tickets.title: Implement a new responsive design stylesheet
tickets.body: The website currently does not adapt well to different screen sizes. Create and implement a new stylesheet that ensures a responsive layout across all devices.

tickets.title: Update copyright year in the footer
tickets.body: The copyright year mentioned in the footer is outdated. Please update it to the current year.

tickets.title: Investigate contact form submission issue
tickets.body: A user reported an issue where the contact form is not submitting emails successfully. Please investigate and fix this bug.

tickets.title: Update product image on homepage
tickets.body: The main product image displayed on the homepage needs to be updated with a newer version. Please replace the current image with the latest product photo.

tickets.title: Add social media icons to header
tickets.body: The website header currently lacks social media icons. Please add icons for the company's social media profiles (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, Instagram).
